name.baseName: Aluminum electrolysis ; Liquid primary aluminum ; China Southern Power Grid ; Alumina for metallurgy
铝电解 ; 液态原铝 ; 南方电网 ; 冶金用氧化铝

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 结合不同工艺的电解铝产量分布比例所计算出的国内电解铝生产过程CO2排放因子的加权平均值。从氧化铝到铝锭。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical usage of the described process is for the production of liquid primary aluminum, employing the southern China power grid in the electrolysis process. Alumina for metallurgy is used as a raw material. This primary aluminum is typically used for manufacturing various aluminum products such as sheets, foils, wires, and extrusions. It serves as an input material for sectors that produce transportation vehicles, packaging, building components, and electrical applications due to its properties such as light weight, conductivity, and corrosion resistance.
所述工艺的技术用途是使用南方电网进行液态原铝生产的电解过程。用于冶金的氧化铝作为原料。此原铝通常用于制造各种铝制品，如铝板、箔、线材和挤压成型品。它作为投入材料，服务于生产交通工具、包装、建筑组件和电气应用的部门，因其属性如轻质、导电性和耐腐蚀性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: On the basis of fully sorting out the production situation of alumina and electrolytic aluminum enterprises across the country, and in accordance with the principle of covering all representative processes and production capacities, and taking into full consideration the distribution of production capacities, nature of enterprises and other factors, we focused on selecting typical primary aluminum smelting enterprises in typical regions such as Henan, Shandong and Guangxi, and carried out an in-depth field survey, and formed a database of carbon emission factors for alumina and electrolytic aluminum, with the data of 2011 as the main body. The database of alumina production includes primary and secondary materials. The alumina production database includes four sub-databases: consumption of raw and auxiliary materials and waste generation, process technology and equipment, energy consumption of process materials, and secondary energy production of self-provided cogeneration plants. For details, see Table 1 of the literature sources.

在对全国 氧化铝、电解铝企业生产情况进行充分梳理的基础 上，按照覆盖所有代表性工艺、代表性产能原则，并充 分考虑产能分布、企业性质等因素，重点选择了河南、 山东、广西等典型地区的典型原铝冶炼企业，开展深入实地调研，并形成以 2011 年数据为主体的氧化铝、电解铝碳排放因子数据库。氧化铝生产数据库包括原 辅料消耗及废弃物产生、工艺技术与设备、工序物料 能源消耗、自备热电厂二次能源生产等 4 个子库。详见文献来源表1。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 张文娟，李会泉，陈波，李强，韩永鹏 & 孙振华. 我国原铝冶炼行业温室气体排放模型. 环境科学研究 vol. 26 1132–1138 (2013).
张文娟，李会泉，陈波，李强，韩永鹏 & 孙振华. 我国原铝冶炼行业温室气体排放模型. 环境科学研究 vol. 26 1132–1138 (2013).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should pay attention to the weighted average CO2 emission factor generated during the electrolysis of aluminum, which is based on a distribution ratio of aluminum production using different processes within China. Special attention should be given to data from the year 2011 as it is the primary source for the carbon emission factors database for alumina and aluminum electrolysis processes. The dataset includes sub-databases for raw & auxiliary material consumption and waste generation, technological processes & equipment, materials & energy consumption in processes, and secondary energy production in self-provided thermal power plants. When modeling, users should include the scope of carbon anode consumption in the electrolysis process, PFCs emissions, and the production process of purchased electricity. It is also advised to consult Table 1 of the source literature for a detailed understanding of the database structure and to ensure the inclusion of all relevant technological factors for accurate lifecycle assessment.

该数据集的使用者应注意电解铝过程中根据中国不同工艺的铝产量分布比例所计算出的CO2排放因子的加权平均值。特别应关注2011年的数据，因为它是氧化铝和电解铝过程碳排放因子数据库的主要来源。数据集包括原辅料消耗及废弃物产生、工艺技术与设备、工序物料能源消耗、自备热电厂二次能源生产等子库。在建模时，用户应包含电解过程中碳阳极消耗、PFCs排放和购买的电力生产过程在内。同时建议参阅文献来源表1，详细了解数据库结构，并确保包含所有相关的技术因素，以便准确进行生命周期评估。

completeness.common:other: The scope of accounting for the production process of electrolytic aluminum covers the consumption of carbon anodes in the electrolysis process, PFCs emissions, and the production process of purchased electricity.
电解铝生产过程核算范围涵盖电解过程碳阳极消耗、PFCs 排放、外购电力生产过程。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
